response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. It is valued at $1,500,000 to you, and I am excited to extend this exceptional piece to you at a special offer. My proposal is to sell it to you for $1,400,000. This is a fantastic chance to secure a high-quality asset at a price that is below its market value. I look forward to discussing the details further with you. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1400000}
